response.overview: This short film is a glimpse at the world of living art, specifically the living statues, as a fascinating way to convey human creativity.Conceived as a piece from a series of short stories exploring the creative mind, this short film has a glimpse at the art of  Ten31 Entertainment, a company that provides living art entertainment for any type of events. They define “living art” as a performance that involves a performer who is highly trained to encapsulate a type of character wearing an amazing handcrafted costume.
response.title: The Creativity Project
